mapper.sql: r.record_id, r.agent_id, r.command, r.start_time, r.exec_type, r.group_id, r.user_id, r.job_id, r.job_type, r.parent_id, r.pid, r.redo_num, r.return_code, r.status, r.success
mapper.select: select , r.end_time, t.job_name, a.name as agent_name, a.host, t.cron_exp, u.user_name from t_record as r inner join t_agent a on r.agent_id = a.agent_id inner join t_user as u on r.user_id = u.user_id left join t_job as t on r.job_id = t.job_id where r.record_id = #{recordId}

select sum(case r.success when 0 then 1 else 0 end) failed, sum(case r.success when 1 then 1 else 0 end) success, sum(case r.success when 2 then 1 else 0 end) killed, sum(case r.success when 3 then 1 else 0 end) timeout, sum(case r.success when 4 then 1 else 0 end) lost, sum(case r.job_type when 0 then 1 else 0 end) singleton, sum(case r.job_type when 1 then 1 else 0 end) flow, sum(case j.cron_type when 0 then 1 else 0 end) crontab, sum(case j.cron_type when 1 then 1 else 0 end) quartz, sum(case r.exec_type when 0 then 1 else 0 end) auto, sum(case r.exec_type when 1 then 1 else 0 end) operator from t_record r left join t_job j on r.job_id=j.job_id
where r.user_id = #{filter.userId}

select , r.end_time, t.job_name, a.name as agent_name, a.host, t.cron_exp, u.user_name from t_record as r inner join t_agent a on r.agent_id = a.agent_id inner join t_user as u on r.user_id = u.user_id inner join t_job as t on r.job_id = t.job_id where r.parent_id = #{recordId} order by r.redo_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into t_record ( agent_id, command, start_time, end_time, exec_type, group_id, user_id, job_id, job_type, parent_id, pid, redo_num, return_code, status, success ) values ( #{agentId}, #{command}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{execType}, #{groupId}, #{userId}, #{jobId}, #{jobType}, #{parentId}, #{pid}, #{redoNum}, #{returnCode}, #{status}, #{success} );
mapper.update: update t_record set end_time = #{endTime}, return_code = #{returnCode}, status = #{status}, success = #{success} where record_id=#{recordId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_record where date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{start} and #{end}
delete from t_record_message where date_format(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{start} and #{end}
